name: Air and Fire
description:
In Air and Fire the player can enter a symbiosis with either the element of air or fire. With air, you can do a double jump, but with fire you can shoot fire balls. Choose wisely what you need to proceed the level and fight the boss at the end. 

Controls:

  • A,D                                    Move
  • Space,W                       Jump
  • E                                         Use
  • A,D + Shift                    Dash
  • Left Mouse, Enter    Sword, Shoot

Team:
